method.name: Get
method.tp:docstring: Get the values of a set of context keys.

arg.name: Keys
arg.tp:docstring: An array of the keys to get.

arg.name: Values
arg.tp:docstring: A Value_Set mapping the requested keys to their values.

method.name: Subscribe
method.tp:docstring: Subscribe to a set of key values

arg.name: Keys
arg.tp:docstring: An array of the keys to subscribe to.

arg.name: SubscriptionObject
arg.tp:docstring: The object on which signals will be emitted when any keys changes in the requested set.

arg.name: Values
arg.tp:docstring: A Value_Set mapping the requested keys to their values.
